Welcome to IATA!
Hello Name,
I’m so excited to have you as part of IATA as an IATA Accredited Agent. We are glad that you chose us, so thank you on behalf of our whole organization.
To get you settled, I wanted to share with you some of our best resources so you can make the most out of your experience with us.
First, we would like you to have access to the latest aviation industry knowledge, news and latest trends by following us on Facebook & Twitter.
Additionally, to maximize your benefits, being an IATA Accredited Agent, some of the great privileges would be access to include:
Impressive access to the IATA ID Card Special offers on some of the leading courses by IATA Training
I'd love to always hear more about how you're liking being with IATA so far.
Also, if there's any way I can be of assistance, I'm here for whatever you may need and look forward to hearing from you soon.
Kind regards
Aurélie Maldague
Customer Experience Specialist
International Air Transport Association (IATA)
Torre Europa, Paseo de la Castellana 95, Madrid, Spain.
